column1: How to register for covid vaccine?
column2: Go to https://www.cowin.gov.in/home and Select register. Then type your mobile number and do the following simple steps. You can select a slot from available slots. NB: Aadhar Card No. is Required

column1: When did the first covid case reported?
column2: A 55-year-old individual from Hubei province in China may have been the first person to have contracted COVID-19, the disease caused by the new coronavirus spreading across the globe. That case dates back to Nov. 17, 2019, according to the South China Morning Post.

First case of COVID-19 infection reported in Kerala, India. On January 27, 2020, a 20 yr old female presented to the Emergency Department in General Hospital, Thrissur, Kerala, with a one-day history of dry cough and sore throat.
